timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't this code be in the smallrye-metrics extension?
timeline.author: gastaldi

replies.bodyText:
All other extensions that enable metrics do it in their own processor.
This extension has all the needed dependencies for it, Metrics extension doesn't. And it sounds odd, if it is at all possible, that Metrics extension would inject configuration of a different extension.
replies.author: jmartisk

replies.bodyText: I thought that those classes would be available since you added quarkus-resteasy as an optional dependency in extensions/smallrye-metrics/runtime/pom.xml, but I'll let someone more experienced review that ;)
replies.author: gastaldi

replies.bodyText: That's just the runtime artifact and it's because QuarkusJaxRsMetricsFilter uses JAX-RS api to compile
replies.author: jmartisk
